segments.text: That girl looks very attractive , doesn ’ t she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think so ? I don ’ t like girls who look like that . I like girls who are not too slim . If you like her , go and talk to her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d like to , but there ’ s her boyfriend . He ’ s very broad-shouldered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s huge ! He must go to the gym to have a well-built body like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you prefer tall girls or short ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t mind , but I like girls with long hair .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have different tastes . I like girls with short hair . I like tall girls-probably because I ’ m so tall myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever dated a girl taller than you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , never . I don ’ t think I ’ Ve ever met a girl taller than me ! Have you gained weight recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . Perhaps I should go to the gym , like that girl ’ s boyfriend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm getting a bit plump myself . Perhaps I ’ ll go with you .
segments.speaker: S1
